title: Walk-Forward Analysis
content:
# Walk-Forward Analysis

A method to minimize overfitting by periodically re-optimizing the strategy on a moving window.

## Process
1. **In-Sample (Train)**: Optimize parameters on data [T1, T2].
2. **Out-of-Sample (Test)**: Test best parameters on data [T2, T3].
3. **Roll Forward**: Shift window. Optimize on [T2, T3], test on [T3, T4].

This simulates the process of re-adapting a strategy to changing market conditions.
